mapper.sql: id, equipmentId, count, principal, target, creator, createDate, lastModifier, lastModDate, status
mapper.update:
UPDATE eam_storage_out
equipmentId = #{map.equipmentId},
count = #{map.count},
principal = #{map.principal},
target = #{map.target},
creator = #{map.creator},
createDate = #{map.createDate},
lastModifier = #{map.lastModifier},
lastModDate = #{map.lastModDate},
status = #{map.status},
WHERE id = #{map.id}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM eam_storage_out
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{id} , '%')
AND equipmentId like CONCAT('%', #{equipmentId} , '%')
AND count like CONCAT('%', #{count} , '%')
AND principal like CONCAT('%', #{principal} , '%')
AND target like CONCAT('%', #{target} , '%')
AND creator like CONCAT('%', #{creator} , '%')
AND createDate like CONCAT('%', #{createDate} , '%')
AND lastModifier like CONCAT('%', #{lastModifier} , '%')
AND lastModDate like CONCAT('%', #{lastModDate} , '%')
AND status like CONCAT('%', #{status} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
